parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

word: proclaim to you the good news:
parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle - 1st Person Plural
str2: From eu and aggelos; to announce good news especially the gospel.
A promise. From epaggello; an announcement.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
